attributes.action: Get more pubs,clubs, and other that sale over 18 stuff to accept the pass hologram
attributes.additional_details: I would like the UK Government to get the pass hologram more well know to clubs, pubs and other shops that sale over 18 products. Alot of people getting declined using there citzencard or card that have the pass hologram on the card. Even tho its say on the Pass website that the Home Office supports it? Well can the uk government do something about it please.
